name: ForgotenHero
description:
Introduction :

Pete is a true hero, he takes all the trashes away from your home. 

After one busy day, he took a nap on a sweet conveyor belt at the factory. It was so comfy that he slept all night. In the morning, he was awaken by the noise of the starting machinery but it was too late. Pete is now on the end of the line, running for his life to avoid burning in the incinerator.

Avoid the trashes, collect useful items and destroy the generators to stop the conveyor belt!

How to play :

  • Use W/A/S/D or the arrow keys to move
  • Collect the yellow items coming at you and use them on the generators with the left click to destroy them
  • Collect the beer to unleash the hurricane kick with the right click, allowing you to destroy the wood boxes and the trash bags
  • Do not fall!
